thread.section_title: Home Zone Furniture Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Home Zone Furniture | homezonefurniture.com
thread.title: Christina
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Christina

author: Christina
title: Christina
text: We were greeted with in 3 minutes of being in the store. Sales rep, Jeff, was friendly and did not hover. Jeff was easily accessible when we decided on a dining set. They didn't have the table at the store but it was ordered by our sales rep. He explained when it should arrive and payment was fast and easy since there was no financing needed. Reasonably priced furniture! Great quality! Very much recommended.
